post.text: This is a moment when we all need to stand together. Watch live as Hillary speaks on the terrorist attack in Orlando.

comment.author: Cassandra
comment.text: Meanwhile she's stolen the election, has traded state favors to dictatorships, racketeering Clinton Foundation charity fraud on company time then hides it and lies about it ... Get ready for WWIII with this lying NWO monster :(

replies.author: Madeleine
replies.text: Facts? Go away troll. You deserve trump.

replies.author: Cassandra
replies.text: Those ARE the facts & you are obviously a corporate paid troll AND a traitor to American democracy for pretending they aren't ... #Seeyouinphilly

replies.author: Thomas
replies.text: Most people on here are so naive about this woman!
